QuestData.Title: The Prophet's Dying Words
QuestData.Description: We... are... bound by oath... to protect the scepter of Orsis.$B$BListen, $c, I don't have much time... left.$B$BFind the sacred receptacle... in the southern end of the city.$B$BDo not... let it... fall into their... hands...
QuestData.RewardText: Though the chest is locked, there is a plaque bearing interesting hieroglyphs above it.
